# image

**Instance Property**

The foreground image the button displays.

## Declaration

```swift
var image: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A configuration contains one image. To change the image based on button state, use [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/configurationUpdateHandler-swift.property] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/updateConfiguration()].

## Configuring images

- **imagePadding**: The distance between the button’s image and text.
- **imagePlacement**: The edge against which the button places the image.
- **imageReservation**: A value that reserves space for the image in the same axis as the edge against which the button places the image.
- **imageColorTransformer**: A block that transforms the image color when the button state changes.
- **preferredSymbolConfigurationForImage**: A requested configuration object for the button symbol image.
